name: fetch-github-token-js
description: GitHub Action to fetch ephemeral GitHub token from Vault using OIDC authentication

scripts.build: npx @vercel/ncc build revoke.cjs -o dist && echo '' >> dist/index.cjs
scripts.verify-bundle: npx @vercel/ncc build revoke.cjs -o dist-verify && diff -b -B dist dist-verify && rm -rf dist-verify
